titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 Second (Absolute Amount) - Description

div.p: Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 second (Absolute Amount) is a CLINICAL INVESTIGATION RESULT ITEM.
Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 second (Absolute Amount) Â is the volume of air that can forcibly be blown out in one second, after full inspiration.
